name: part_003
file: tmp_【チラ見せ枠_NIGHT】ときのそら New Year’s Party 2026『Dreams in Motion』 [ko7ypXM_-yQ]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: Donor lists for Flower Stands (フラスタ) are displayed with 'Beyond' playing in the background.
Donor lists for Lunch Boxes (お弁当) are displayed with 'Beyond' and another song in the background.
Donor lists for Wristbands (リストバンド) are displayed with a song featuring her 'Idol Pledge' lyrics.
Waiting screen for the concert 'Dreams in Motion' with the full 'Idol Pledge' audio.
Live venue view showing the audience clapping and waiting for the performance to start.

subtitles.original: 差し入れを贈ってくださった皆様、本当にありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: To everyone who sent us gifts, thank you very much!

subtitles.original: フラスタ [公開OK] お名前一覧
subtitles.english: Flower Stands [Public OK] Name List

subtitles.original: ...の空を
subtitles.english: ...the sky

subtitles.original: Come with us, dance, dance, dance, step by step
subtitles.english: Come with us, dance, dance, dance, step by step

subtitles.original: 越えては闇に焼けたまま
subtitles.english: Crossing over, still scorched in the darkness

subtitles.original: 目を醒ましても離れないで
subtitles.english: Even if I wake up, please don't leave me

subtitles.original: Maybe need it, 正気じゃないのよ
subtitles.english: Maybe need it, I'm not in my right mind

subtitles.original: 太陽が忘れられない
subtitles.english: I can't forget the sun

subtitles.original: Colorless, そんなじゃないから
subtitles.english: Colorless, because it's not like that

subtitles.original: 独り占めしてユフォリア
subtitles.english: Keeping the euphoria all to myself

subtitles.original: お弁当 [公開OK] お名前一覧
subtitles.english: Lunch Boxes [Public OK] Name List

subtitles.original: 気にしてないような言葉は装飾で
subtitles.english: Words that seem indifferent are just decorations

subtitles.original: メイクのように罠流せない
subtitles.english: I can't wash away the traps like makeup

subtitles.original: 三百六十度、偽りだって寂し切れるような
subtitles.english: 360 degrees, even if it's a lie, it's enough to feel lonely

subtitles.original: 私にかまって、Overnight crazy crazy love
subtitles.english: Pay attention to me, Overnight crazy crazy love

subtitles.original: 待ってろ、ガラス纏わせて
subtitles.english: Wait for me, let me wear glass

subtitles.original: 君の鼓動は、私の心臓心理を
subtitles.english: Your heartbeat is my heart's psychology

subtitles.original: 振り返るなよ、静止しないで
subtitles.english: Don't look back, don't stop

subtitles.original: 過ぎ去ったネオン残像、シュレディンガー
subtitles.english: The neon afterimage that passed by, Schrödinger

subtitles.original: スライダー みたいに漂えば、曇、曇なかった
subtitles.english: If it floats like a slider, there were no clouds, no clouds

subtitles.original: 指先でまた、君を探している
subtitles.english: I'm looking for you again with my fingertips

subtitles.original: その声を聞かせてよ
subtitles.english: Let me hear that voice

subtitles.original: 私にかまって、教えてよ恋の先を
subtitles.english: Pay attention to me, tell me what's beyond love

subtitles.original: 広がってく彷徨うユニバース
subtitles.english: The wandering universe is expanding

subtitles.original: 君の存在は、私の将来までも
subtitles.english: Your existence, even my future

subtitles.original: 飛び込んだのよ、突き合わせてよね
subtitles.english: I've jumped in, let's match up

subtitles.original: 一切合切 dance, dance, step by step、夢中になって
subtitles.english: Everything dance, dance, step by step, becoming absorbed

subtitles.original: リストバンド [公開OK] お名前一覧
subtitles.english: Wristbands [Public OK] Name List

subtitles.original: ここに宣言します、すべてを注ぎ込む
subtitles.english: I declare here, I will pour everything in

subtitles.original: 開演までしばらくお待ちください。
subtitles.english: Please wait a while until the performance starts.

subtitles.original: 一、病める時も 健やかなる時も ずっと
subtitles.english: One: Whether in sickness or in health, always

subtitles.original: 愛を歌い続けることを 堂々と誓います
subtitles.english: I solemnly swear to continue singing of love

subtitles.original: 二、歌うとかダンスも もっと追求します
subtitles.english: Two: I will pursue singing and dancing even more

subtitles.original: 三、ずっと推してもらえるアイドルになって見せます
subtitles.english: Three: I'll show you I can become an idol you can support forever

subtitles.original: 四、不安定な未来も 私が照らすんだ
subtitles.english: Four: Even in an unstable future, I will light the way

subtitles.original: それでも落ち込んじゃう日は 思い出していいよ みんなのその笑顔
subtitles.english: Even so, on days when you feel down, it's okay to remember everyone's smiles
